TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is a citizen of GPE and GPE and GPE , who was born in DATE and lives in GPE , GPE . He is represented before the ORG by Mr PERSON , a lawyer practising in GPE , GPE and GPE . The respondent Government are represented by PERSON , Agent , and ORG , Deputy Agent .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
On DATE ORG ( one of the legal predecessors of the armed forces of GPE ) requisitioned CARDINAL empty gas cylinders from the applicant .

Since the cylinders were neither returned to him nor did he obtain compensation for the loss , on DATE the applicant initiated civil proceedings before ORG in GPE seeking pecuniary damages together with default interest and legal costs from ORG GPE .
On DATE ORG in GPE granted the applicant ’s claim for damages in the amount of CARDINAL NORP markas ( MONEY ) , his claim for default interest and his claim for legal costs .
On DATE ORG upheld the award of damages , amended the award of legal costs and rejected the claim for default interest .
On DATE ORG in GPE decided not to enforce the final judgment indicated above pursuant to ORG .
On DATE ORG upheld the first instance decision of DATE .
The applicant did not appeal to ORG .
The LAW entered into force on DATE .

ORG hereinafter “ the Constitutional Court ” ) , which was set up pursuant to LAW , is composed of CARDINAL members : CARDINAL members from ORG ) , CARDINAL from PERSON ( the other Entity ) and CARDINAL non - citizens of GPE or of neighbouring GPE , selected by the President of ORG .
